name: Reader Rabbit: 1st Grade
overview: Why is raingear raining down on Wordville? Journey with Reader Rabbit and Sam the Lion up to Cloud Nine to sort out this meteorlogical mystery! Features: Educational mini-games designed to teach basic 1st grade skills including Language Arts, Science, Problem Solving, and Math as well as Creative Exploration and Expression. Multiple difficulty levels for each mini-game that can be changed at any time. Full video cutscenes and voice acting throughout the game. Simple controls using the Wii Remote.
